description: This section defines generic attributes used by Azure Client Libraries.

azure.service.request.id.description: The unique identifier of the service request. It's generated by the Azure service and returned with the response.

azure.resource_provider.namespace.description: [Azure Resource Provider Namespace](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/azure-resource-manager/management/azure-services-resource-providers) as recognized by the client.

azure.client.id.description: The unique identifier of the client instance.
